Introduction.text: Get started with App Inventor by creating an app that translates text to speech on the click of a button!
Connect using the companion app so you can test this on your mobile device. If you don't know how to connect, <a href='http://appinventor.mit.edu/explore/ai2/setup.html' target='_blank'>click here.

Add a button.text: Click and hold on the word 'Button' in the '>Palette. Drag your mouse over to the Viewer. Release the mouse. A new button will appear on the Viewer.
Check to see if you can see your button in your companion app.
